name: raze
voiceLines: Yes! I'm pumped!
Ah! Look at this wreckage! I'm so proud.
There we go! Nice work everyone!
Ah. Smells like victory. And gunpowder.
Come back with a bigger gun.

name: reyna
voiceLines: They have no idea how heartless I am.
I've stood over so many corpses. A few more does not matter.
They stopped breathing? Excellent. Then we're done.
Someone else will cleanup. I don't take out the trash.
If I act superior, it's because I am.

name: sage
voiceLines: I am both shield and sword.
I will soothe this turmoil, with fire if I must.
This place, I can feel its pain, it aches for redemption.
Now to mend what we have broken.
Even death cannot stop me.

name: sova
voiceLines: Wherever they run, I will find them.
You'll have your intel, I promise.
The cold air feels wonderful.
Good thing I was with you, yes?
Today is not our day to die.

name: iso
voiceLines: Enough training, it's time.
Once we find the right rhythm, it's over.
So? Who has to die?
I have a time for a selfie before we leave, right? I'll be fast.
Anyone attacking us can answer to me.
